title: Quick Chili
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
Stir chili beans, tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, chili seasoning, and chili powder into the beef; bring to a boil.
ingredients: 2 pounds ground beef, or to taste
1 (1.25 ounce) package chili seasoning (such as Brooks)
1 ½ teaspoons chili powder, or more to taste
